ComicInfo.Summary:
The Trial of Eclipso: Eclipso is captured by police and Bruce Gordon is asked to testify against him. Eclipso blackmails Gordon to keep him from testifying.
The Giant Who Once Ruled Earth: Mark thinks he has done his work when he exposes a hoax, but then the same supernatural menace appears again, and this time it's genuine.
